pr_title: ISPN-12398 Update Backup manager resource names and directories

timeline.author: oraNod

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/cli/src/main/java/org/infinispan/cli/commands/Backup.java b/cli/src/main/java/org/infinispan/cli/commands/Backup.java
index f54a2b68af..85a16e872e 100644
--- a/cli/src/main/java/org/infinispan/cli/commands/Backup.java
+++ b/cli/src/main/java/org/infinispan/cli/commands/Backup.java

@@ -187,7 +187,7 @@ public boolean isHelp() {
             completer = CacheCompleter.class, name = CACHES)
       List<String> caches;
 
-      @OptionList(description = "Comma separated list of templates to include, '*' indicates all available",
+      @OptionList(description = "Comma separated list of cache templates to include, '*' indicates all available",
             completer = CacheConfigurationCompleter.class, name = TEMPLATES)
       List<String> templates;
